content: After the Romans were defeated by the Persians the Quran correctly predicted that they will be victorious again. This battle took place near the Dead Sea.
The Romans were defeated in the lowest of land and they will be, after this defeat, victorious again
content_ar:
٢ غُلِبَتِ الرُّومُ
٣ فِي أَدْنَى الْأَرْضِ وَهُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ غَلَبِهِمْ سَيَغْلِبُونَ

content: Adna in Arabic أَدْنَى has two meanings: the nearest and the lowest. Today we know that the Dead Sea is the lowest point on Earth (423 m or 1388 ft. below sea level).
How could an illiterate man who lived 1400 years ago have known about lowest point on Earth?
